name: Omero Biobank Server
description: From the microscope to publication, OMERO handles all your images in a secure central repository. You can view, organize, analyze and share your data from anywhere you have internet access. Work with your images from a desktop app (Windows, Mac or Linux), from the web or from 3rd party software. Over 140 image file formats supported, including all major microscope formats.
instance_information:
OMERO handles all your images in a secure central repository.

Default user: root
Default password: omero
